data.title: Globee® Business Awards

data.text:
19th Annual 2024 Globee® Awards for Technology

For the 2024 Globee® Awards for Technology, we are proud to present a distinguished panel of judges. These judges come from a diverse range of organizations around the world, bringing with them a wealth of expertise and insight. Their evaluations, based on average scores and detailed inputs determined the winners of the 2024 awards.

We also extend our heartfelt thanks to all other judges who participated and contributed their expertise, regardless of the number of assignments completed.
